org.cloudbus.cloudsim

Class MyHarddriveStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.HarddriveStorage
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.MyHarddriveStorage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storage
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MyPowerHarddriveStorage

    public class MyHarddriveStorage
extends HarddriveStorage
    My HarddriveStorage extends HarddriveStorage.java by overwriting some of its methods. The modifications are not important but necessary for the new storage implementation. Mainly, it adds variable concerning the Waiting Queue, the mode and the Active End Time with their corresponding GETTER and SETTER. Additionally, only one constructor is available based on a HDD storage model in order to simplify things. Some models are provided and more can be easily implemented by the user.
    Author:
    Baptiste Louis

      • addFile

        public double addFile(File file)
        Adds a file to the storage. First, the method checks if there is enough space on the storage, then it checks if the file with the same name is already taken to avoid duplicate filenames.
        Specified by:
        addFile in interface Storage
        Overrides:
        addFile in class HarddriveStorage
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be added
        Returns:
        the time taken (in seconds) for adding the specified file
